001package org.nasdanika.exec.gen;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Objects;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl;
007import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
008import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
009import org.nasdanika.common.ListCompoundSupplierFactory;
010import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
011import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
012import org.nasdanika.emf.EObjectAdaptable;
013
014public class ListSupplierFactoryAdapter extends AdapterImpl implements SupplierFactory<List<Object>> {
015        
016        public ListSupplierFactoryAdapter(org.nasdanika.exec.List list) {
017                setTarget(list);
018        }
019        
020        @Override
021        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
022                return type == SupplierFactory.class;
023        }
024                
025        @Override
026        public Supplier<List<Object>> create(Context context) {
027                ListCompoundSupplierFactory<Object> elementsFactory = new ListCompoundSupplierFactory<>("List");
028                for (EObject e: ((org.nasdanika.exec.List) getTarget()).getElements()) {
029                        elementsFactory.add(Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptToSupplierFactory(e, Object.class), "Cannot adapt to SupplierFactory"));
030                }               
031                
032                return elementsFactory.create(context);
033        }       
034
035}
